required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Mass Balance, Pharmacokinetics, Biotransformation and Bioavailability Study of ODM-201 in Healthy Male Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Two-Part Open-Label, Single-Centre Mass Balance, Pharmacokinetics, Biotransformation and Absolute Bioavailability Study of ODM-201 in Healthy Male Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: A study to investigate absolute bioavailability of ODM-201 and to determine the mass balance and routes of excretion of ODM-201 in healthy volunteers.

detailed_description.textblock: 6 healthy male subjects will be enrolled in part 1 and part 2 of the study, respectively

primary_outcome.measure: Amount of 14C-ODM-201 dose excreted and cumulative amount excreted in urine and faeces and total. Amount excreted and cumulative amount excreted in urine, faeces and total expressed as a percentage of the administered dose.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Urine and faecal samples are collected baseline (Day-1) 72 h post-dose after IV dosing and up-to 14 day post-dose after oral solution dosing

other_outcome.measure: Metabolite profile of 14C-ODM-201 in plasma, urine and faeces
other_outcome.time_frame: up to 14 days post-dose after oral solution dosing

other_outcome.measure: Maximum concentration (Cmax) of 14C-radioactivity in plasma
other_outcome.time_frame: The samples were taken 72 h post-dose after IV dosing and up-to 14 day post-dose after oral solution dosing

other_outcome.measure: Time to maximum concentration (tmax) of 14C-radioactivity in plasma
other_outcome.time_frame: The samples were taken 72 h post-dose after IV dosing and up-to 14 day post-dose after oral solution dosing

other_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration-time curve (AUC(0-t)) of 14C-radioactivity in plasma
other_outcome.time_frame: The samples were taken 72 h post-dose after IV dosing and up-to 14 day post-dose after oral solution dosing

other_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration-time curve (AUC(0-infinity)) of 14C-radioactivity in plasma
other_outcome.time_frame: The samples were taken 72 h post-dose after IV dosing and up-to 14 day post-dose after oral solution dosing

other_outcome.measure: Half life (t1/2) of 14C-radioactivity in plasma
other_outcome.time_frame: The samples were taken 72 h post-dose after IV dosing and up-to 14 day post-dose after oral solution dosing

other_outcome.measure: Maximum concentration (Cmax) of ODM-201 in plasma
other_outcome.time_frame: The samples were taken 72 h post-dose after IV dosing and up-to 216 h post-dose after oral solution dosing

other_outcome.time_frame: The samples were taken 24 h post-dose after oral solution dosing

other_outcome.time_frame: The samples were taken 24 h post-dose after oral solution dosing

other_outcome.measure: Renal elimination for ODM-201 in urine
other_outcome.time_frame: The samples were taken 72 h post-dose after IV dosing and up-to 14 d post-dose after oral solution dosing

other_outcome.measure: Renal elimination for 14C-ODM-201 in urine
other_outcome.time_frame: The samples were taken up-to 14 d post-dose after oral solution dosing

other_outcome.measure: Fraction absorbed (FA) of total radioactivity based on urinary recovery of total radioactivity for both IV and oral dosing
other_outcome.time_frame: The samples were taken 72 h post-dose after IV dosing and up-to 14 d post-dose after oral solution dosing

other_outcome.measure: Adverse events
other_outcome.time_frame: Collected 7 days post-dose in part 1 and up to 14 days post-dose in part 2

other_outcome.measure: Physical examination
other_outcome.time_frame: Assessed at screening, pre-dose, at discharge from the study centre (72 h and 7 d post-dose in part 1 and latest at 14 d post-dose in part 2)

other_outcome.measure: Blood pressure
other_outcome.time_frame: Assessed at screening, pre-dose, 3 h, 5 h, 12 h, 24 h, 36 h and 48 h post-dose and at discharge from the study centre (72 h post-dose in part 1 and latest at 14 d post-dose in part 2) and in addition in part 1 7 d post-dose

other_outcome.measure: Heart rate
other_outcome.time_frame: Assessed at screening, pre-dose, 3 h, 5 h, 12 h, 24 h, 36 h and 48 h post-dose and at discharge from the study centre (72 h post-dose in part 1 and latest at 14 d post-dose in part 2) and in addition in part 1 7 d post-dose

other_outcome.measure: Oral temperature
other_outcome.time_frame: Assessed at screening, pre-dose, 3 h, 5 h, 12 h, 24 h, 36 h and 48 h post-dose and at discharge from the study centre (72 h post-dose in part 1 and latest at 14 d post-dose in part 2) and in addition in part 1 7 d post-dose

other_outcome.measure: 12-lead ECG
other_outcome.time_frame: Assessed at screening, pre-dose, 3 h, 5 h, 12 h, 24 h, 36 h and 48 h post-dose and at discharge from the study centre (72 h post-dose in part 1 and latest at 14 d post-dose in part 2) and in addition in part 1 7 d post-dose

other_outcome.measure: Clinical chemistry
other_outcome.time_frame: Assessed at screening, pre-dose, 24 h and 48 h post-dose and 7 d post-dose in part 1 and latest at 14 d post-dose in part 2
other_outcome.description: Alanine Aminotransferase, Albumin, Alkaline Phosphatase, Aspartate Aminotransferase, Bilirubin (Total), Calcium, Creatinine, Creatinine clearance, Lactate dehydrogenase, Potassium, Sodium and Urea

other_outcome.measure: Haematology
other_outcome.time_frame: Assessed at screening, pre-dose, 24 h and 48 h post-dose and 7 d post-dose in part 1 and latest at 14 d post-dose in part 2
other_outcome.description: Basophils, Eosinophils, Haematocrit, Haemoglobin, Lymphocytes, MCH, MCHC, MCV, Monocytes, Neutrophils, Red Blood Cell Count, White Blood Cell Count and Thrombocytes

other_outcome.measure: Urinalysis
other_outcome.time_frame: Assessed at screening, pre-dose, 24 h and 48 h post-dose and 7 d post-dose in part 1 and latest at 14 d post-dose in part 2
other_outcome.description: Leucocytes, protein, erythrocytes, glucose and specific gravity

arm_group.description: A single oral 300 mg tablet of ODM-201 followed by single intravenous 100 microg of 14C-ODM-201 containing not more than 37 kBq (1000 nCi)14C
A single oral solution of 300 mg 14C-ODM-201 containing no more than 6.3 MBq (171 microCi) 14C

criteria.textblock:
Key Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy males
- Aged 50 to 65 years (inclusive)
- Normal weight defined as a body mass index (BMI) of >18.5 and <32.0 kg/m2
- Weight 55 to 100 kg (inclusive)
- Adequate method of contraception during the study and for a period of 6 months after study drug administration
Key exclusion Criteria:
- Evidence of clinically significant disease
- Intake of any medication that could affect the outcome of the study
- Known hypersensitivity to the active substances or the excipients of the drug or any serious adverse reaction or serious hypersensitivity to any drug or the formulation excipients
- History of anaphylactic/anaphylactoid reactions
- Clinically significant abnormal biochemistry, haematology or urinalysis
- Current or history of any drug or alcohol abuse in the past 2 years
- Regular alcohol consumption >21 units per week (1 unit = Â½ pint beer, 25 mL of 40% spirit or a 125 mL glass of wine)
- Current use or use within the last 12 months of nicotine products
- Positive drugs of abuse test result
- Positive hepatitis B surface antigen, hepatitis C virus antibody or human immunodeficiency virus results
- Presence or history of clinically significant allergy requiring treatment
